**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt">

</p>

<p>The <b>Pacific geoduck</b> (<span></span> <i title="English pronunciation respelling">GOO-ee-duk</i>; <i>Panopea generosa</i>) is a species of very large saltwater clam in the family Hiatellidae. The common name is derived from the Lushootseed name, <span title="Lushootseed-language text"><i lang="lut">gʷidəq</i></span>.
</p><p>The geoduck is native to the coastal waters of the eastern North Pacific Ocean from Alaska</p>...
